documents.document:
LED billboard

SBC is a manufacturer specializes in full color LED billboard. We believe that service create value, so we offer good quality and excellent service for our customers only, based on reasonable budget.
LED billboard main used for outdoor and indoor advertisement.
You can install is at a public square, super mall, beside on the way, building, bus station, railway, airport, stadium and other places.
SBC LED billboard is the most stable one in the domain.
Please pay attention to the features as follow:
Wide range LED billboards will be given, such as P10, P16, P20, P25, etc.
Waterproof degree: IP65
Life time: more than 5 years.
High quality LED chips, power suppliers, and cabinets with the best design based on your environment.

Whatever the videos, pictures, words are displayed; you will get a vivid and fresh effecting. And impress the viewers, let your advertisements are memorable to viewers; bring the successful advertisement profits to you.
After you make the decision, professional install structure drawing will be offered you to guide you to prepare the structure for the LED billboard installation. If you are difficult to prepare that, we can offer you.
We can send our professional engineers to your country to install and adjust the LED billboard for you. And free training will be offered, if you and your engineers come to our SBC.
The precise solution or suggestion will be offered within a half hour after you tell us your detailed requirements.
Wherever your LED screen is located, we will offer you excellent after-sales service.

More information about SBC and our products, please contact Eric.
Company name: Shenzhen SBC Photoelectricity Co., Ltd

Outdoor full color hotel led display

LED display signs are very applicable to hotels, motels and resorts of all kinds. One of the key features of this form of signage for hotels and similar businesses is that LED signs can be updated quickly and easily. They can also be set to display specific messages at certain times in the day. Businesses of this kind will usually have to update their rates and offers at various times throughout the week and even throughout the day. Depending on occupancy levels, bookings and cancellations, hotels and guesthouses may wish to adjust their rates at certain times. If the building is largely unoccupied on a given day, it is not unusual for room rates to be lowered considerably in order to attract business. In an environment where prices are changing rapidly dynamic signage is essential. Managers and staff need to be in a position where they can advertise offers and reductions immediately and effectively to the public, which simply cannot be done with a static traditional sign .Many hotels opt for signage that combines both dynamic and static elements. Generally they choose to have the name of the hotel on a traditional billboard, as this part of their display will not require regular updating. Most hotels will then incorporate an LED message board into their signage, which can be updated to feature the latest rates, offers, and announcements. For example, this message board may feature information about an ongoing or upcoming conference in the hotel. It may be used to congratulate a newly married couple who are holding their reception on the premises. Alternatively the message board could feature information about meal prices, or upcoming entertainment in the hotel. Within the hotel itself LED display boards are often seen affixed to walls, or as freestanding sandwich boards. These boards are used to inform guests of ongoing events within the hotel. For example conference members can be directed to the correct room in the hotel by a message board placed in the reception area. Similarly wedding guests and members of private parties can find the appropriate locations in the hotel by reading the message board. Health club members and guests can be informed of fitness classes or special events by this method also, and LED display boards can also be used to advertise meal deals, day tours and other occasional events.

Outdoor full color waterproof school led display

School led display from SBC are an affordable, efficient solution for communicating news and events to the campus and to the community. Our attention-grabbing LED school signs can dynamically broadcast campus happenings, both indoors and out. Schools and learning centers can save a significant amount of money by using LED school signs instead or traditional marquees. Whether for indoor or outdoor use, such message centers will not only be more cost-efficient, but will also definitely be more effective in capturing the attention of students, teachers, parents and other school employees
LED signs are also great platforms for text messages, videos, animations, and digital messages. Rather than having to pay for advertisements in newspapers or local TV and radio stations, schools can broadcast vital information through their huge electronic signs
   * Exam dates and special events
   * Holiday notice and School timing alerts
   * Announce schedule changes or cancellations.
   * Advertise bookstore promotions & product specials.
   * Schedule daily, weekly, monthly and yearly reminders

Energy saving 1R1G1B high reliability and stability led scre

Full color led screen, also called Three Primary Colors LED Screen, of which the smallest led screen unit is made up of red, green and blue colors. The working principle is the same with the monitor of computers, and it can show the original colors. The gray scale of each kind of color is 256, which together makes the 16.7million colors, to show dynamic pictures with rich colors in real time. Every smallest unit of fullcolor LED display consists of red, green and blue LED luminotrons. LED sign matches with the computer dot by dot, and it’s available for VGA mode, DVD, VCD, and TV recording programmes, live show, etc, with excellent display effect, high reliability and stability. We can correct the white balance of three primary colors by the patent---? correction technology, ensure the display stability by the most advanced wave soldering machines, what’s more, there is no mosaic in the LED panel.

High technology and resolution led screen

Led Screen is a kind of high-tech products including photoelectric technology, micro-electric technology, computer technology and information processing technology as well as display technology. According to the applications, it includes Indoor led screen, Semi-outdoor led screen and Outdoor LED screen; According to the primary colors, Single color LED display, Dual color LED screen, and Full color LED display; According to the functions, Strip LED Screen, Image-text LED screen, and Multimedia LED display . All the LED screen  are designed in modules, and the display part connects well with the control part, with good compatibility among systems. LED display cabinets could connect with each other arbitrarily, and the installation is easy. Screens are controlled by computer, and display the contents synchronously (or asynchronously) displayed by the monitor of the computer. Screens share information with internet, can display video signals, pictures and animation, etc. LED Display Screen is widely used in railway, aviation, stadium, meeting room, highway, commercial plaza, stock market, traffic control center, and hotel, etc.
Technical advantage:
We use unique dynamic white balance control system, to make the temperature of colors less than ±520K on the condition that the dynamic brightness is 10%-100%, to make screens reach white balance in all kinds of light in different circumstances when keep the best viewing distance. White balance is the key to measure the led display effect, and the color temperature standard of Display products is D65. Intellectualized and automatic brightness control system can control the brightness of screens according to the outside brightness get by the photoreceptor, to make images more soft to eyes, to save power, lengthen the life span, meantime, manual adjustment is available, such as to control the brightness and contrast according to the weather(sunny, cloudy, rainy or foggy, etc). Additionally, we control the brightness and white balance of each red led, green led and blue led to 6000K-9500K, to make the color seems pure no matter what the weather is like.

Full color RGB outdoor led screen to show picture and video

Outdoor led screens are available in a wide range of pixel pitches from 25mm to 10mm, making them suitable for a variety of applications and viewing distances from 5 to 500m!  All feature incredibly high brightness levels meaning they are able to produce an outstanding high impact picture in any weather conditions, even bright sunlight. An IP65 rating makes the panels fully weatherproof to the very worst that the elements can throw at them, whilst individual rubberised shaders over each LED further improve contrast levels whilst offering wide viewing angles both horizontally and vertically. Outdoor led screens are available with either front or rear service access, which can be specified to meet the requirements of your installation. The Outdoor led screen range is available in either E, S or P line, giving you a choice of features and price points to suit your needs and budget.

High definition and wide viewing-angle LED big TV

SBC’s LED TV aims to provide you with all the latest LED TV reviews and news as well as information about where you can buy your LED TV at the lowest price possible. We aim to transform the nations home entertainment systems; once you see a LED TV there is little chance that your will ever go back to either a plasma or LCD equivalent. LED TV are the very latest generation of LCD televisions that have reached the market yet unless you are TV specialist the chances are you know relatively little about them. The current range of LED TV on the market is quite limited and is dominated by a few of the major consumer electronic manufactures such as Sharp, LG and Samsung.  Samsung in particular are seen as innovators within this market place as it is they that originally pioneered the LED TV technology. This domination of the LED TV market will not last forever and all the other major players in the home entertainment sector are doing their most to catch up as quickly as possible and will all be adding LED TV to flat screen TV line-up in the coming months.  This increased in competition should see a downward pressure on prices, making LED TV much more affordable.

High quality indoor full color LED screen TV

LED screen TV offer significant advantages over LCD and Plasma screens. LED screen TV scan be better described as LED back-lit LCD screens: they’re made of lots of Light Emitting Diodes, with a normal LCD screen in front. The advantages over normal LCD TV are due to the different kind of back-lighting LED provide. Because these diodes can be switched on and off very quickly, fast moving images are displayed without blurring. LED-backlit screens also give great, deep blacks in dark scenes. LED screens with local dimming’ are able to switch power to different areas of the led screen TV on and off independently, giving very high contrast rates. Edge-lit LED screens (the alternative to local dimming) are incredibly energy efficient – using around 40% less power than equivalent LCD screen.

Strip led display

KU26A ,KU55Ware our patented design, especially for both outdoor and indoor stage background lighting effect and video display, the LED strip video screen is derived with stable direct current and can display video both synchronously and synchronously with 16.7 million colors. It is advantaged in handiness, super-thinness, transparency, rainproof, super large area application, been pieced and fit together on option and easy installation and disassembly. It is suitable for the stage background of grand performance both indoor and outdoor, advertising media display and so on.

Stage led display

Act as the manifestation of visual art, and compared with traditional stage background,Stage backgroundled displayScreen is the binding of light and art in the parts of modern artistic environment design, artistic stage design as well as indoor decoration and so on, and spectators can get much more visual information from LED Screen than traditional stage background, that greatly bring spectators and actors together, and moves the active atmosphere. On the other hand,Stage background led Display screen makes spectators feel brand new by the shiny stage decorated via the rich colors of LED Screen. LED products are more and more popular with human beings with the usage in international stages these years. With exquisite LED chips, LED Display Screen shows the beautiful and brilliant effect of stages home and abroad. There are various ways of image formation that it can not only imitate live-actions, but also return the vivid display effect to original conditions, what is more, it could build the real scenes to virtual ones, and that will leave spectators more space to image.
The size of the LED Screen for the concert is 7.3m(height)X10.4m(width), and the pixel pitch is 10mm which is belong to the latest PST series and suitable for indoor and outdoor use with SMD 3-in-1, anyway, it leaves song fans deep impression with the super bright display images, wide viewing angle, high contrast level and shiny scenes.

Stadium led display

The stadium led display screen would realize functions such as information demonstration, time and score display, competition information management, and sound and image synchronization broadcast, make the stadium to satisfy the demand of large-scale sports events and assembly.The stadium led displays are widely used in the football field, basketball court, swimming center and diving center. And the functions of the stadium led displays include:1.Show function: Can display multi languages and several formats texts, and realize the live broadcast;2.function of time and score: Through the electronic referee, the screen can realize the function of time and score of the basketball and volleyball race. And show the name of the race team, the score goals, the name of the athletes who make the goal, substitution, red and yellow warning card sand other information;3.Information processing function: can add up the score and fouls automatically; And when the athletes break the record, the screen can show the notice and make congratulations.4.Emergency treatment function: The stadium led display are used for the significant political activities, so it must has the emergency treatment function, when there is something wrong with the internet, the display can work still. And all the automatic function of the screen should can be switch to manual adjusted.Contacts:
www.sbcled.com www.sbc-led.com
E-mail: mequeen@sbcled.com
Skype: mequeen liu,
MSN: mequeen9@msn.cn.
